profileAlternative.name: Jill Zhang
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at JPMorgan Chase & Co.
profileAlternative.summary:
An experienced professional specialized in Data Science. Solid skills in modeling building, text mining and data manipulation. Passion about data and convert the insights hidden behind data to real actions.

Experience in:
Big Data: Hadoop, Mapreducer, Spark, Data Lake infrastructure, ETL and ELT.
Machine Learning: Supervised Learning (Regression, Decision Tree, Naive Bayes Classifiers), Unsupervised Learning (Clustering, PCA, Matrix Factorization).
Coding: R, Python (Numpy, Scipy,Pandas, Scikit-learn), SPSS, SAS, Excel VBA
Data Visualization: Tableau, SAS JMP, MS Power BI
Digital Analytics: Adobe Omniture, Google Analytics, Google AdWords, DoubleClick, DART, Forrester, Scarborough, eMarketer

With Marketing Skills in:
Market Research: Comscore, Adobe implementation, Nielsen DAR, Nielsen SDK
Search Marketing: Google PPC, Bing Ads, Baidu Advertising
Web Analytics: Javascript tag management, Google Webmaster


For more information, please contact me here or email me jianglu.zhang@nyu.edu.

given.text: Jill was one of the best interns I have worked with, she always willing to get involved in any aspect of our business and always willing to learn. While she may have not realized this at the time, but Jill positive attitude was extremely helpful in a very turbulent time for our team. She will be a true asset to her future employer and I was happy to be apart of her growth as she was also apart of mine. See less

received.text:
Kevin is definitely a great coworker to work with. He pays attention to every detail at work while keeps strategic insights at the whole trends. He is so friendly to get along with and gives me a lot of inspirations while I was working in Publishers Clearing House.

... See more
